page.title: 05The High Street
page.content: On the High Street there is a road and a lot of cars go on the road.There are a lot of people doing their shopping. The main shops they go to are the Co-op and the Spar. There are chemists, carpet and wallpaper shops and if you want some clothes you should go to Arnotts. There are lots and lots of shops on High Street: I like the sweet shop best of all and the toy shop as well.There is a Clydesdale shop and the Coffee Pot.I like the Coffee Pot as well because I get cakes in there.There is a hotel called The County and there are three churches - Trinity and Alvah, St. Mary's and St. Andrew's. Men are building a house on High Street just now so you must be careful as you walk past.
